SEARCH
Module UsefulSchoolPortal
Package objects

Class School

java.lang.Object
objects.School
public class School extends Object
The School class is a representation of a school in the system. It includes many essential fields for a school and also has methods that help the school perform its job as a school.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Daniel Santillan

    School(String name, int schoolID, int blocks)

  • Constructor Details

    • School

      public School(String name, int schoolID, int blocks)
      This constructor builds a new school by ID, name, and block count. The files are either created (for new schools) or read in (for existing schools), establishing the data locations.
      Parameters:
      name - Given name
      schoolID - Given school ID
      blocks - Given block count

    • addNewInfraction

      public void addNewInfraction(Infraction inf)
      The addNewInfraction method adds a new infraction to the infractions ArrayList and the infractions file.
      Parameters:
      inf - The infraction to add

    • modifyInfraction

      public void modifyInfraction(String name, int infractionID, int studentID, int staffID, String reason)
      The modifyInfraction method modifies an existing infraction (the one with the same ID) and adds the modifications to the infractions file without adding a new infraction.
      Parameters:
      name - Given name
      infractionID - Given infraction ID
      studentID - Given student ID
      staffID - Given staff ID
      reason - Given reason

    • deleteInfraction

      public void deleteInfraction(int infractionID)
      The deleteInfraction method removes an infraction from the ArrayList of infractions and the infractions file.
      Parameters:
      infractionID - The infractionID of the infraction to be purged

    • getInfractionsByUser

      public ArrayList<Infraction> getInfractionsByUser(int userID)
      The getInfractionsByUser method returns the list of infractions by user. This includes the users involved in the infraction.
      Parameters:
      userID - The user ID
      Returns:
      The infractions with the user involved.

    • modifyClassInFile

      public void modifyClassInFile(SchoolClass cl, int gradingMethod)
      The modifyClassInFile method takes a class from data and edits its entry in the school list file and the ArrayList. The grading method is changed.
      Parameters:
      cl - The class to modify
      gradingMethod - The new grading method
